cashback_program.program_name: Additional Instant Discount on SBI Bank EMI Transactions
cashback_program.description: Instant discount on EMI transactions for Samsung CE products
cashback_program.terms_and_conditions: Discount reflected on payment gateway only; excludes corporate cards; one transaction per card per month; delinquent and over-limit cards not eligible.

earning_structure.description: Instant discount ranging from 5% to 20% based on product and tenure
earning_structure.terms_and_conditions: Maximum discount capped per product category; only on 3/6/9/12 month tenures.

redemption.method: Instant discount applied at payment gateway
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Discount cannot be redeemed as cash; only one transaction per card allowed during offer period.

pdfs.title: Additional Instant Discount on SBI Bank EMI Transactions
pdfs.description: Terms and conditions for additional instant discount offer on SBI Bank Credit Card EMI transactions for Samsung Consumer Electronics products.
